name: Raiceridge
printed_effect:
You can Expend {frost} in order to target and Special
Ascend your Raiceros to this Raiceridge from
your hand. When an Elestral that is not
{thunder}-Enchanted declares an attack you can
Expend {thunder} in order to Negate that attack.
effect: This Raiceridge in your hand can Special Ascend from your Raiceros if you also Expend {frost}. When an Elestral that is not {thunder}-Enchanted declares an attack you can Expend {thunder} in order to Negate that attack.
